name: Sword of Descension
description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
effect: Effective for players on "PlayStation Network" only.\nHitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a {0} chance to deal {1} ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by {2}.
